Entities.Name: datDefaults
Entities.Schema: *[DefaultID:n, MenuID:n, VariantID1:s, VariantID2:s, VariantID3:s, VariantID4:s, VariantID5:s]
Entities.OriginalSchema: *[DefaultID:n, MenuID:n, VariantID1:s, VariantID2:s, VariantID3:s, VariantID4:s, VariantID5:s]

Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    ThisItem.DescriptionShort,
    "Espresso",
    LookUp(datAssets, AssetDesc = "Demitasse Cup", AssetURL),
    "Iced Tea",
    LookUp(datAssets, AssetDesc = "Cold Cup", AssetURL),
    "Italian Soda",
    LookUp(datAssets, AssetDesc = "Cold Cup", AssetURL),
    LookUp(datAssets, AssetDesc = "Hot Cup", AssetURL)
)

Switch(
    ThisItem.DescriptionShort,
    "Espresso",
    (cheaterCup.Y + cheaterCup.Height + 15) - (cheaterCup.Height * (ThisItem.Chocolate + ThisItem.Coffee) / 100),
    (cheaterCup.Y + cheaterCup.Height) - (cheaterCup.Height * (ThisItem.Chocolate + ThisItem.Coffee) / 100)
)

Switch(varMenuItem,
    "Coffee",
    SortByColumns(
        GroupBy(
            Filter(
                datVariants,
                VariantType <> "Milk",
                VariantType <> "Flavor",
                VariantType <> "Food"
            ), 
            "VariantType",
            "GroupedData"
        ),
        "VariantType", 
        ["Size", "Temperature", "Cup", "Helper"]
    ),
    "Milk-based Drinks",
    SortByColumns(
        GroupBy(
            Filter(
                datVariants,
                VariantType <> "Food",
                VariantType <> "Helper"
            ), 
            "VariantType",
            "GroupedData"
        ),
        "VariantType", 
        ["Size", "Milk", "Flavor", "Temperature", "Cup"]
    ),
    "Tea Drinks",
    SortByColumns(
        GroupBy(
            Filter(
                datVariants,
                VariantType <> "Milk",
                VariantType <> "Flavor",
                VariantType <> "Food", 
                VariantType <> "Extra Shot"
            ), 
            "VariantType",
            "GroupedData"
        ),
        "VariantType", 
        ["Size", "Milk", "Flavor", "Temperature", "Cup", "Helper"]
    )
)

Concatenate(LookUp(colDrinkOrder, id = 1, size), " ",LookUp(colDrinkOrder, id = 1, temp), " ", LookUp(colDrinkOrder, id = 1, type), " ", LookUp(colDrinkOrder, id = 1, milk), " ", LookUp(colDrinkOrder, id = 1, cup))
